alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 10:49PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arapahoe, southwestern Washington and eastern Adams Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1049 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodlin School, or 32 miles southwest of Akron, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodlin School, Lindon, Shamrock, Last Chance, Elba and Woodrow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County
